com.dotmarketing.plugin.ant

Class UnzipPluginsTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.tools.ant.ProjectComponent
      • org.apache.tools.ant.Task
        • com.dotmarketing.plugin.ant.UnzipPluginsTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class UnzipPluginsTask
extends org.apache.tools.ant.Task
    This task will unzip the plugins in the correct order into the directory that gets used to build the bundle plugin for war distribution.
    Author:
    Andres Olarte
